description:
<p>Are you a Practitioner with a Level 6 qualification in Minor Illness and Injuries looking for a rewarding role? Do you want to utilize all the skills from your training in a rewarding environment? You’ll find a friendly welcome and a home for your talents at Practice Plus Group. Whether you’re coming from a General Practice, the ambulance service or elsewhere, we’ll give you time to use your skills – and help you build a fulfilling career.</p>
<p>We offer Practitioners clear career paths with lots of exciting options. Where you go is up to you!</p>
title: Nurse Practitioner with level 6 minor injuries
